name: HIGhSCORE
description:
Get ready to jump, collect, and compete with HIGhSCORE, a 2D platform jumper with rogue-lite elements. In this game, players have to jump higher and higher, collecting items to boost their attributes and score higher combos, multipliers and points. As you progress and level up, you'll unlock new features and items, and can customize the appearance of your character.

Challenge yourself in singleplayer mode and compete against other players on the online leaderboard. With addictive gameplay and a nice learning curve, HIGhSCORE is the perfect game for fans of platformers and rogue-lite games. Join the competition and see if you have what it takes to become the ultimate high scorer!

REACH THE SKY



On the eternal hunt for the highscore you will unlock new items and cosmetics!

Level up your character and unlock new abilities!

Will you break the record and be on the top of the rankings?

FEATURES



Increase your score - Level up and buy items to push further!

Customize your character - Personalize your character from a range of hats and colors!

Unlock new items - Buy new items that will boost your score!

Collect Runes - Use runes to start with preferred items!

Global leaderboard - Compete with others and try to be number one!

Medals - Earn medals for your best runs!

Achievements - Reach milestones to prove your skills to the world!
